mapper.select: select attraction_info.content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, first_image, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude, overview from attraction_info left outer join attraction_description on attraction_info.content_id = attraction_description.content_id where first_image != "" order by rand() limit #{num}
select sido_code, sido_name, eng_name, image, description from sido;
select i.content_id, title, addr1, first_image, overview, latitude, longitude from attraction_info i, attraction_description d where i.content_id = d.content_id and i.content_id=#{contentId}
select content_id, title, addr1, first_image from trip_plan p, attraction_info i where p.attraction_content_id = i.content_id group by attraction_content_id order by count(*) desc limit 10;
